Package com.purnendu.quizo.utilities

Interface NetworkListener.NetworkChangeListener

Enclosing class:
NetworkListener
public static interface NetworkListener.NetworkChangeListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when network connectivity changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onNetworkConnected()
    Called when the device establishes a network connection.
    void
    onNetworkDisconnected()
    Called when the device loses its network connection.

  • Method Details

    • onNetworkConnected

      void onNetworkConnected()
      Called when the device establishes a network connection.

    • onNetworkDisconnected

      void onNetworkDisconnected()
      Called when the device loses its network connection.
